Please keep a hold of this module for your first few days as the links may be useful as we guide you through some of the first things you will see on EPAM’s internal platforms.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Focus for the win\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#995A00\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It can be tempting to try and do onboarding while multitasking on a call or when you find a free minute in the middle of something else, but we would ask that you dedicate focus time to Onboarding to make sure you complete all the steps.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Setting error\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Email\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#995A00\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We use \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Outlook\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" for email (and Microsoft tools for most other tasks). Now, when you first open your inbox, it may seem slightly overwhelming as we send out regular emails to staff to keep them informed about our processes, latest developments and so on. Our advice is to look at the mails, see what is relevant to you and the systems that you use and what you may need to track production work and administrative tasks. Once you have done that you may wish to set up rules, filters and folders to have a workflow that is optimized for you.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-warning\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"One tip: \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFT are automated system notifications and ADPT mails contain information onboarding trainings. Rarely are these urgent but you can receive a number of them, so you may wish to filter these and check them daily. More important mails are normally tagged Org or News.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"There is no formal training for Outlook but \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMADPTFAQ/18.+Outlook+How-Tos\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"this Knowledge Base page\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" contains tips and advice. Advice on email signatures will be given in due course.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"One more important step here is to customize your signature. Also included on the platform is a library of reusable RFI/RFP response documents.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-warning\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please note \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"that some materials housed on the Presales portal are extremely confidential.
